thread.title: Feyenoord all but crowned Dutch champions after tighest-ever goal-line technology decision.. and incredible blunder by PSV goalkeeper Jeroen Zoet in the dying minutes
thread.title_full: Feyenoord all but crowned Dutch champions after tighest-ever goal-line technology decision.. and incredible blunder by PSV goalkeeper Jeroen Zoet in the dying minutes

title: Feyenoord all but crowned Dutch champions after tighest-ever goal-line technology decision.. and incredible blunder by PSV goalkeeper Jeroen Zoet in the dying minutes
text:
EFL Zo close Feyenoord all but crowned Dutch champions after tighest-ever goal-line technology decision.. and incredible blunder by PSV goalkeeper Jeroen Zoet in the dying minutes 
Giovanni van Bronckhorst's side set to win first league title since 1999 thanks to a little help from technology By Dave Fraser
